attributes.action: Make all Bank Cheifs to repay the bonuses paid in past 2 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all are aware that UK is in Deep Recesssion and that is costing all tax payer a fortune.

We all know it started from the Cheifs of all major Banks(RBS,HBOS), who have gained millions and millions of pounds as bonuses and salary in past 2 years.

We should ask prime minister to force all those cheifs to repay all the bonus and pay they have gained in past two years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
